name: Scarecrow Chorale
description:
Entry for Spooky 2D Jam '21

Prototype/concept for a JRPG-inspired combat mixed with rhythm game mechanics. Play as the Rhythm Scarecrows and defend your barn from the Combat Crows by countering their attacks to the beat!

(We weren't able to make use of all 48 hours, sadly, due to work. Artist effectively only had around 12 hours worth of artwork.)

Artist: AntoReakk https://www.artstation.com/antoreakk

Programmer: RcmAldo

Music Composer: Point To Pluto https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfnklXW1Jmm2xOGY7M2Vhzg

Sound Effects:

Record Scratch SFX - https://freesound.org/people/luffy/sounds/3536/

Slash SFX - https://freesound.org/people/jobro/sounds/74831/

Punch SFX - https://freesound.org/people/RSilveira_88/sounds/216198/
